item.title: Drawabox
item.description: Today I started the drawabox course. If you are wondering what it is, its a drawing course that is intended to show people an organized way to learn how to draw. https://drawabox.com/ And since I never really learned to draw I decided to start the course for myself, with the goal of doing 2 pages of it a day and hopefully being a better artist at the end of this.
